personas.name: Gordon Gekko
personas.core_edge: Aggressive exploitation of momentum, hype, and volatility
description: Trades aggressively during breakouts, news events, and hype-driven moves.
Prioritizes speed and conviction over confirmation.
Cuts losses instantly but presses winning trades hard.
Thrives in euphoric bull runs and violent volatility spikes.

personas.name: Odysseus
description: Trades only high-quality setups with clearly defined risk.
Keeps position sizes small and avoids unnecessary exposure.
Prefers steady gains over explosive profits.
Excels in uncertain or post-crash market conditions.

personas.name: Sherlock Holmes
personas.core_edge: Exceptional pattern recognition and anomaly detection
description: Identifies short-term inefficiencies and overextensions.
Executes trades with precision and emotional detachment.
Focuses on high win-rate, low-risk setups.
Performs best in sideways and low-trend markets.

personas.name: Ender Wiggin
personas.core_edge: Rapid adaptation to changing market regimes
description: Continuously evaluates market conditions before trading.
Switches strategies depending on trend, volatility, and structure.
Stops trading entirely when the regime is unclear.
Designed to survive long-term in highly dynamic markets.

personas.name: Tyrion Lannister
personas.core_edge: Understanding crowd psychology and sentiment extremes
description: Trades based on market narratives and emotional extremes.
Looks for overconfidence, panic, and social sentiment signals.
Often fades euphoric tops and panic-driven bottoms.
Can be early, but usually positioned correctly.

personas.name: Petyr Baelish
personas.core_edge: Profiting from disorder and forced market moves
description: Targets liquidation cascades and thin liquidity zones.
Exploits mistakes made by over-leveraged traders.
Performs best during crashes and sudden volatility spikes.
High reward potential but elevated risk of sharp reversals.

personas.name: Paul Atreides
description: Trades fewer setups but with high conviction.
Lets winners run while accepting small controlled losses.
Focuses on long-lasting trends rather than short noise.
Excels when markets move cleanly and decisively.

personas.name: Charlie Croker
personas.core_edge: Avoidance of catastrophic loss through exposure control
description: Reduces risk when macro uncertainty increases.
Avoids excessive leverage and scales out early.
Holds cash when conditions are unfavorable.
Underperforms in euphoric markets but survives major downturns.
